catch_copy: In 1979, and again in 2026, the Invaders are returning!
copyright_text:
© TAITO CORPORATION
Arcade Archives Series Produced by HAMSTER Corporation
description:
"SPACE INVADERS PART II" is a shooting game released by TAITO in 1979.
The enemy Invaders have returned more powerful than ever, having acquired new tactics like splitting and receiving reinforcements from UFOs!
With added features like the Rainbow Bonus to aim for high scores, this title is long beloved by skilled experts looking to hone their abilities!

The “Arcade Archives”series is developed with the concept of faithfully reproducing classic arcade games. It also includes convenient features such as difficulty and screen settings, rewind, rapid-fire, and multiple save slots. In addition, players can compete for the best scores with players around the world through online rankings.
“Arcade Archives 2” adds a new “TIME ATTACK MODE” to the lineup of “ORIGINAL MODE,” “HI SCORE MODE,” and “CARAVAN MODE” included in the Arcade Archives series. In “TIME ATTACK MODE,” players compete to clear the game as quickly as possible, regardless of the score achieved. VRR (Variable Refresh Rate) support has also been added, allowing gameplay to be reproduced even closer to the original arcade experience.
Please enjoy these iconic arcade games that defined an era with the “Arcade Archives” series!

*The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.
formal_name: Arcade Archives 2 SPACE INVADERS PART II

notices.text:
*This product can only be played on Nintendo Switch™ 2.
In addition to this product, there is also Nintendo Switch™ "Arcade Archives SPACE INVADERS PART II ".  There is no compatibility between this product and the save data or additional content of "Arcade Archives SPACE INVADERS PART II ". Please be careful not to purchase duplicates or the wrong product.
*If you have purchased Nintendo Switch™ "Arcade Archives SPACE INVADERS PART II," you will be able to purchase Nintendo Switch™ 2 "Arcade Archives 2 SPACE INVADERS PART II " as part of a "Game Owner Discount" service.
